reviewText: I bought this for the movie Something New and the other movies were a bonus and for the price where do you go wrong?Sometimes you just want a luv story that isn't too corny and this will do the trick. Deliver Us From Eva you have to like one main women who steers the other women which drives their men nuts and they hire a man to date Eva who after some jabs from her does settle her down and falls for her.
I really liked the combo set.  I enjoyed seeing each character of the movies because they are good actors.
These movies are all great... watch them all the same day I got it. It arrive way before the time listed and was in shrink wrap.

This was a Christmas gift for my hair stylist who is a big fan of the movie Something New.  I knew she liked Deliver Us From Eva as well and the bonus is The Best Man.  All three movies are great and to get 3 for the price of what you'd spend often times for one was the deal sealer for me.

If you know someone that likes even one of the movies, believe me buying this DVD will make them happy given they get two more to watch on a rainy day or while just hanging with the girls for a few laughs.
I wanted all three of these movies and didn't want to buy them separatly. When i saw all three of them in a dvd pack i thought perfect. But what made it even better was the price!
The DVD came in excellent condition and I brought for a gift and my mom really love it....Thanks
arrived as described and timely
I love these movies and so glad that I found all three together.  Now just need a good rainy day to relax and enjoy all day movie day.

I love all of these movies but Deliver Us From Eva is my favorite.  It is so funny and I enjoy watching it over and over.  Something New reminds me of my self. I laugh so much when watching this because I am the Kenya type to the tee.  When I met my husband, he was younger than me and very outgoing and active.  He was something new for me and he has transformed me and made me a believer.  The Best Man is a classic and I plan to order the The Best Man's Holiday ASAP also looking forward to next movie coming in 2015/2016.  Can't wait!!
love it very clear
One of my favorite movies to add to my collection.
LOVE IT
3 classics love each one. On time package arrival.
Great price for 3 classics
These two movies together is a great idea.  I love both of these movies & all the stars.  Get these movies if you don't already have them.

Deliver Us From Eva, is a good movie, and can be enjoyed by everyone, the same can be said about Something New, however The Best Man is filled with expletives, and it would of been better without that.

I constantly reminisced on scenes from these movies that brought joy and laughter through entertainment. Now I have them and can watch them as much as I want. Great set of movies, ladies grab your ice cream and sit back and relax, be ready to laugh, cry, but most important rejoice in these love stories.
Great price for great movies. The movie played well. Good entertainment when guests stop by. I'm glad that I purchased this item.
3 great movies on 3 dvds in 1 case. i bought it just to see the best man, as i had seen the best man holiday, but i am glad it came with the other 2 movies, as they were worth watching
The price for these 3 amazing movies is so worth it. I bought it mainly for the movie "The Best Man" and I saw the other two and loved them just as much as the one I bought it for.

As the headline suggests you cant go wrong with this set. All three movies are excellent, funny, and very enjoyable. Definitely worth adding to your collection and at less than 9 bucks its a no brainer...
Love all 3 movies. I enjoy every one of them. Not only are the movies funny but they have important life messages.

I ordered this because I was trying to find "The Best Man," which should be a classic, if it's not already.  "Deliver Us From Eva" ended up being a pretty entertaining film.  The surprise of the bunch was "Something New."  For a rom/com, it deals with some pretty  deep issues and has generally good acting.  I would recommend all three films.
I bought this so that I could own Best Man to go with the Best Man 2. Thought it was a better deal to get three movie for the price of one...
Bought for Something New but loved delivering eva as well. Entertaining and will try the other movies as well. Nice
i liked Gabriel shes just an amazing character shes awesom watched her for years ago i ordered cuz it was just that good
this three pack movie is all that and more if you like comedy then get this one it's all good
good dvd for the price of one purchase, there are three movies. I loves these types of dvd especially. Good.
I really like these movies. Im glad they come three-fold. Im adding to my little movie collection now. Good, funny, movies!
The best of 21st Century good, clean, fun romantic dramedy. Stay home with the family, laugh, cry and enjoy one another!
Even though I've seen all 3 of these movies, I was very impressed with the price of the 3 movies and fast is was shipped to me.
These are three of my favorite movies on one DVD. It is very convenient and three for one combo at an awesome price!
Really enjoyed watching these films while I had the flu.  They were very entertaining even though I know they are not new, they were new to me.

I LOVE ALL THREE MOVIES. I PURCHASED THIS MOVIE MAINLY FOR THE BEST MAN. THE SEQUEL THE BEST MAN HOLIDAY WAS COMING OUT SO I WANTED TO OWN THE BEST MAN AND THE OTHER TWO MOVIES WERE A BONUS!! I LOVE THE MOVIES. GREAT BUY!
I love all of these movies so this was a great deal. I can watch all these movies over and over.
This just what I wanted 3 for the price of one, now my movies are complete for the moment. smile

these movies will have you laughing.  have a girls night and enjoy while eating popcorn and drinking your favorite beverage.
This dvd is great nice picture, I watch it over and over. I like the 3 movies combined in one.

I love the movies and I really like the three in one package however I thought I was down loading them to my kindle.
Thanks!

Loved watching these Black actors/actresses! Three movies for the price of one.  In case anyone is wondering there are 3 separate DVD's.  I thought that all 3 movies were on one DVD but this was just as good.
A great price for 3 movies, 3 in one DVD, family enjoyed watching the movies on family night. I would recommend this combination of DVD to family and friends.
I enjoyed watching all three movies.  They are fun with serious messages for all of us.  I would recommend these movies either in thsi package or even individually.
Love these movies. I just wanted to start a collection of oldies but goodies to pull out on a rainy day!
I love the fact that its a triple feature and does not skip which is a plus! This was a great buy!
It was a good deal for 3 movies however two of the dvds arrived a little scratched but everything plays just fine.
I got the movies I wanted in a cheap set rather than individually and essentially got one more free. I was so excited when I saw this offer.
This triple feature movie was worth buying. The price was right :-) I enjoyed it very much. Graet customer service, keep up the great work!!
And you don't have to get up to switch the dvds.  Love these  will be back for another as soo as the budget allows.

I have yet to watch the other two movies, but my copy of Something New skipped. The DVD box came with half of it's plastic on, but that's okay. However, halfway through the movie, it skipped and stopped playing. Like I said, I have yet to watch the others, but I purchased the triple feature because of "Something New" mainly
I love the fact that i could get more then one movie for the price of one...i love amazon..i love ...love stories so those movies were right up my alley. definitely a must have in your movie library.
Good buy for three movies. They were all in good condition without any defects. The price was very good also.
My family and I loved each and every movie, the quality and sound is great; we will definitely purchase more.

WONDERFUL TO OFFER A "TRIPLE FEATURE" OF ROMANTIC COMEDIES  with several actors and actresses !
I will recommend it to several of my friends.

All three films are good and it is nice to have 3 in one regular box. "Something New" was fresh because it mingled racism with classism, which relates well. Also, the issues it raised about people's fears about perception of themselves, and how it subtly showed the tenderness of being real or trying to reach into another group; was light, humorous, and real.
I needed The Best Man on DVD real bad. (Wore my tape out)  LOL! The other 2 were an added bonus.  I need some more movies like this and Love Jones.
I liked the movie. I received the movie on time. The movie remind me of the 80's. It was Great.
All three of these movies are favorites for me so I love that I could find them in a triple feature! And the speedy shipping through amazon wasn't bad either!
In love with this DVD, especially the fact that it's got 3 amazing movies in it... it was also very cheap! Thank you so much.
Thank you! This product was delivered so fast, I was so impressed. It definitely fixed my urge to watch "Something New" and the other two movies were bonus.
I only orders this set for "Something New" but getting the other two movies was just a perk. Overall, I am happy with my purchase. Thanks Amazon!!!

Great, Great and Great!!!  I can't believe I have all three of these great films in one box.  Endless entertainment!!  Admittedly, THE BEST MAN is my in my top 5 best of the best films.  Laced with so many great actors who all deliver stellar performances and you can't go wrong with a drama/comedy/romance centered on a reunion weekend/wedding with old college friends.  The quality of all three movies very good.  I like that each movie is on its own disk.  I expected one disc with all three.  That can be a challenge in my house as the remote strangely disappears.
THE BEST MAN --- A++
DELIVER US FROM EVA --- A+
SOMETHING NEW --- A

Great buy.  I was only looking to purchase Something New, but stumbled upon the triple feature adding the movies Deliver us from Eva and The Best Man.  I enjoy all three movies and they will be added to my library.  Early Christmas gift to myself.
My fience and I were just looking for one of the dvds in this bundle, but when we stumbled on this buy we were very pleased. The films are great. I highly recommend.
